name: Limits (MigDev)
description:
This Game is made for the BenBonk GameJam #2. The Theme of this Jam was Space Limitations. While Playing the game the playing area continuously shrinks, therefore limiting playing space. 

All art was made by me. 

Sound Effects were made using sfxr https://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html and the music was made from assets in Brackeys 2d mega pack https://devassets.com/assets/2d-mega-pack/.

How to Play.

2 Players. 

 Player 1  will control the blue character via the  ASWD keys while player 2  controls the red character via the  JKIL keys. Both players will need to try to collect collectibles(pink objects)while avoiding the shrinking walls and cannon balls(orange objects) that fire at them. Players will  easily be able  to avoid cannon balls by avoiding the aim warnings(green objects).

1 Player

The game is ment to be played but if you wish to play alone use the arrow keys to move both the blue and red characters and try to collect as many collectibles as you can. Read the 2 player instructions above to understand how the game works.
